caption.center: COMMONWEALTH OF PENNSYLVANIA, Respondent v. EDWARD DOMINO, Petitioner.

court.center: Supreme Court of Pennsylvania, Middle District.

opinion.posture: No. 810 MAL 2005. Petition for Allowance of Appeal from the Order of the Superior Court.
opinion.opinion_text: AND NOW, this 29th day of December 2005, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
